gh {command} <arguments> [flags].description: Work seamlessly with GitHub from the command line.

gh alias {command} <arguments> [flags].description: Aliases can be used to make shortcuts for gh commands or to compose multiple commands.

gh alias import (<filename> | -) [flags].description: Import aliases from the contents of a YAML file.

gh alias list.description: This command prints out all of the aliases gh is configured to use.

gh alias set <alias> <expansion> [flags].description: Define a word that will expand to a full gh command when invoked.
